seo.title: Services
seo.description: I develop websites that are fast, beautiful, and cheap to run.

hero.heading: I develop inexpensive yet performant websites
hero.content: The most important part of a website, besides a nice design, is it's performance. It contributes to better placement in search results and improves the user experience. Performance often comes with a high price, but not when I create your website.

features.heading: My services
features.content: I develop performant websites that you can run at a low price. To achieve this, I use several different tools and technologies. If your current website uses any of these services or technologies, you might benefit from <0>contacting me</0>.

cta.heading: Get with the times
cta.content: I am proud to use modern and effective methods to build modern and effective solutions. Does that sound interesting?
